alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 3:47PM CDT until May 16 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. .Due to recent rainfall from thunderstorms, the Maple River near Mapleton is slowly rising. Anticipating a jump up to Minor flood stage, peaking within Minor flood stage across the end of the week into the weekend. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94). * WHEN...From this evening to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding begins on high ground near gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tonight and remain in flood stage through early next week before falling. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
